Please use a modern browser to fully experience our website, such as the newest versions of Edge, Chrome, Firefox or Safari etc.

Courses, training and workshops

To help the users take advantage of the LUNARC and the NAISS resources, courses are given in different topics in high performance computing.

The following events are currently scheduled

Link to RSS
  • 24 Oct 2025

    Running jobs on clusters, 25 November 2025

  • 25 Aug 2025

    CodeRefinery workshop on software develpment tools in September/October 2025
